name: They can remove your content at any time and without notice

tosdr.tldr: Youtube reserves to right to decide if a content violates the terms of service, not only if the user is a copyright infringer, but also, but not limited to, if the content is about pornography, obscenity, excessive length. The content may be removed and the user's account terminated without prior notice and in the sole discretion of Youtube.
